description:
Freshly updated with an Ending Log, major fixes, some cosmetic updates, and some other stuff, but we've still got that wonderful self-indulgent, self-absorbed, and even self-aware narration that's saved children's lives*! Click on the Support button below to see all the changes. But enough of that. On to more pressing matters:

You! Indeed, you! This right here is a fully voiced original app that stars you making life changing choices! That's right! Not some strange amalgamation of an assumption of your persona, no: You!

Adventure Book!: The Adventure Game!!:: The Choice Gamebook!!! is more than just a punctuation disaster; it's an original choose-your-story written exclusively for webOS that's voiced by a classically trained actor out of UCLA. He also writes descriptions for this application on a semi-professional level.

What does this mean? Well, aside from the fact that the author is a narcissist, it means that you get to enjoy a family-friendly, humorous adventure without having to read, while deciding how you want to affect the fantastical world cooked up within. It also means you don't have to deal with another book-poorly-converted-to-an-app application.

If you enjoyed the quirky and perilous adventures of yore, then you'll certainly enjoy the 50 plus sometimes good, sometimes great, and always over-the-top endings. If you have good (or even bad) things to say, post a rating or contact the author directly.

Either way, have fun and BEWARE!

*Note: children were only probably saved.
